items.sentence: Tom sat on the floor surrounded by his children and grandchildren.
Apparently, Tom told Mary if she was late again, she\'d get fired.
I didn\'t know that Tom and Mary used to be married to each other.
I didn\'t know that Tom was the one who was going to sing tonight.
I think that it\'s unlikely I\'ll be able to pass my driving test.
I didn\'t tell Tom why I didn\'t want him to go to Boston with me.
I wish more parents allowed their children to do things like this.
Tom helped Mary carry her groceries up the steps to her apartment.
Tom is the only person I know besides myself who likes to do that.
Tom took off his cowboy hat and wiped the sweat from his forehead.
Tom used to come over every Monday evening and play music with me.
I don\'t think that anyone suspected that you weren\'t really Tom.
I just don\'t want to have people thinking that I\'m not sociable.
The first thing you\'ll usually want to do is check the oil level.
Tom drove back to his house to get something that he\'d forgotten.
Going to Australia is one of the things Tom wants to do next year.
Tom caught Mary trying to steam open an envelope addressed to him.
I find it hard to imagine that anyone could possibly believe this.
I could hardly keep from laughing when I saw Tom and Mary dancing.
Tom used to play second base for his high school\'s baseball team.
